content:
Below are 7 JIRAs ready for a block vote.

Please let me know if any need to be pulled for discussion. The block vote will happen July 16, 2020, 1-2pm ET during the main OO call.

Device
• FHIR-27798 - Change cardinality of DeviceDefinition.type – Hans Buitendijk - https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-27798
• FHIR-26949 – add doNotPerform to DeviceRequest – @Jose Costa Teixeira - https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-26949

DeviceRequest
• FHIR-27868 – Need fix description of DeviceRequest.performes – @Yunwei Wang - https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-27868

SupplyRequest
• FHIR-27908 – SupplyRequest.Requestor – Please add CareTeam – @Emma Jones - https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-27908

DeviceDefinition
• FHIR-25951 – Align manufacturer definition with MedicinalProductDefinition – @Peter Bomberg - https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-25951?filter=12886
• FHIR-25922 – DeviceDefinition.capability should be CodeablReference – @Jose Costa Teixeira - https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-25922
DeviceUseStatement
• FHIR-25799 – Improve reference to Device/DeviceDefinition - Hans Buitendijk - https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-25799

Thank you!
